mapper.select: select p.id pid, p.name pname, p.url purl, p.icon picon, p.status pstatus, p.seq pseq, p.comment pcomment, p.pid ppid, c.id cid, c.name cname, c.url curl, c.icon cicon, c.status cstatus, c.seq cseq, c.comment ccomment, c.pid cpid from sys_menuitem p left outer join sys_menuitem c on c.pid = p.id where p.pid is null order by pseq, cseq

select p.id pid, p.name pname, p.url purl, p.icon picon, p.status pstatus, p.seq pseq, p.comment pcomment, p.pid ppid, c.id cid, c.name cname, c.url curl, c.icon cicon, c.seq cseq, c.status cstatus, c.comment ccomment, c.pid cpid from sys_menuitem p left outer join sys_menuitem c on c.pid = p.id where p.pid is null and id = #{id} order by pseq, cseq
mapper.insert: insert into sys_menuitem (id, name, url, icon, seq, status, pid, comment) values (#{id}, #{name}, #{url}, #{icon}, #{seq}, #{status}, #{parent.id}, #{comment})
mapper.delete: delete from sys_menuitem where id=#{id} or pid=#{id}
